children.text: Test module containing an exhaustive set of possible YANG statements
An extension that takes no argument and does not support substatements
An extension whose argument would appear as an XML attribute in YIN but appears simply as text in YINsolidated and does not support substatements
An extension whose argument would appear as an XML subelement in YIN but appears simply as text in YINsolidated and does not support substatements
An extension that takes no argument but supports substatements because the #yinformat tag is included
An extension whose argument appears as an XML attribute in YINsolidated and supports substatements because the #yinformat tag is included
An extension whose argument appears as an XML subelement in YINsolidated and supports substatements because the #yinformat tag is included
An anyxml node at the model root
A choice at the model root
A container at the model root
A leaf at the model root
A leaf-list at the model root
A list at the model root
A leaf in a grouping with a refined description
A derived identity in an augmenting module
